name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FocusKeeper - Block Distracting Websites, Stay Productive

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block social media sites, set tab limits, and stay focused with FocusKeeper. Boost productivity by limiting online distractions.

Stop losing hours to mindless doomscrolling. Time is money, start acting like it. This extension is completely free, there is a donate button on the blocked-distraction site, the less you get distracted the less you will see it ;)
